violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provided name 'Дмитрий' at 0:08.168-0:09.468, but operator did not repeat it back or ask for confirmation. Operator immediately proceeded to next question 'Из какого города вы взялись?' at 0:10.128 without any echo or acknowledgment of the name.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for initial name collection
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When customer provides their name (or any contact data), always repeat it back and ask for confirmation: 'Дмитрий, верно?' This applies even at the beginning of the call, not just during formal order recording. Note: Operator did correctly use echo method later when collecting full name and phone number for the order.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name 'Семьчетыре колеса', operator name 'Алина', and offer to help. Proper closing 'спасибо за звонок, всего доброго, до свидания'. Customer orientation question 'Чем-то еще могу вам помочь?' asked at end.

7.2.evidence: Initial name 'Дмитрий' provided at 0:08.168 but not echoed back with confirmation. Later formal name and phone collection properly used echo method.
7.2.note: Violation at initial name collection, though later formal data collection was correct

7.3.evidence: Intro at 0.008s (well within 5s), disconnect gap approximately 2.68s (within 5s)

7.4.evidence: No interruptions without apology detected in transcript

6.1.evidence: Longest search period was ~33.7 seconds (under 45s threshold). Customer did not hang up, call completed successfully.

9.1.evidence: Multiple searches conducted, longest was 33.7 seconds (0:07:09.746 to 0:07:43.413), which is under the 40-second threshold

9.3.evidence: Operator thanked customer for waiting multiple times: 'Спасибо за ожидание' at 0:02:03.930, 0:02:35.393, 0:07:43.413, 0:12:30.931, 0:15:12.355

3.1.evidence: Customer requested information about stamped wheels, delivery, and payment options. All questions were answered: product specs provided, delivery method (Luch transport), payment options detailed, order successfully placed with number 98-23-85.

3.3.evidence: No confidential information (office numbers, internal codes) disclosed. All information provided was customer-appropriate.

3.6.evidence: Operator checked system multiple times ('Минутку, пожалуйста', 'Сейчас посмотрю') before providing information

5.1.evidence: All required information provided: product code (R314338), specs, price (3200 RUB per disc, 12800 total), delivery address (Магнитогорск, улица Вокзальная, 1/1), delivery method (Luch), payment options, order number (98-23-85)

10.2.evidence: Information provided logically, script structure followed, professional presentation throughout

10.3.evidence: Used customer name 'Дмитрий' consistently, built rapport, maintained conversation control, proper opening and closing

10.6.evidence: Complete and accurate information provided including product specifications, pricing, delivery details, payment options. Operator demonstrated confident command of information.

2.1.evidence: No call dropout or service refusal. Call completed successfully with order placed.

1.1.evidence: No profanity, rudeness, or harsh language detected. Operator remained professional and polite throughout.

4.1.evidence: Customer was cooperative and not difficult. No issues with customer handling.
4.1.note: Customer was pleasant and cooperative, no difficult behavior to handle

positive_observations: Excellent greeting with all required elements (company name, operator name, offer to help)
Professional and polite tone maintained throughout the entire 16-minute call
Properly used echo method when collecting phone number (segment by segment with confirmations)
Properly echoed surname 'Бру-вер' with confirmation when collecting formal details
Thanked customer for waiting multiple times during searches
Used customer name consistently throughout conversation
Provided complete and detailed product information including specs and pricing
Successfully handled payment and delivery questions with multiple options
Proper closing with gratitude and polite farewell
Good search time management - all searches under 40 seconds
Excellent customer service for upsell attempt (secret bolts) - accepted customer's polite decline gracefully
Confirmed order details comprehensively before finalizing
Sent order confirmation via SMS as promised

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps available and used for precise echo method analysis. Clear speaker diarization. High-quality transcript with minimal transcription errors.
